page.syntax: Tree_Data as C = *TREE_FROM_OUTLINE(C outlinedef[,C outline_ident[,C separator[,L expandBranch]]])

argument.name: Tree_Data
argument.description: Data formatted for display in a tree control.

argument.name: outlinedef
argument.description: A CR-LF delimited list indented with instances of Indent_String.

argument.name: outline_ident
argument.description: Optional. Default = "" (8 spaces). A character that separates the "branches" in the tree data.

argument.name: separator
argument.description: Optional. Default = ".". A character string that represents an indent level in the indented list.

page.description: Transform an outline string to a tree string.
page.discussion: The *TREE_FROM_OUTLINE() function converts an indented list into data formatted for display in a tree control.
page.example: dim outline as C ? outline = customer +orders ++items ++salespeople +payment ++checks Location +State ? *tree_from_outline(outline,"+",".") = customer.orders.items customer.orders.salespeople customer.payment.checks Location.State
